verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogue<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> there <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G1563>there<s%> which <S%G2192>had<s%> a <S%G3583>withered<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> they <S%G3906>watched<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1487>whether<s%> he would <S%G2323>heal<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> on the sabbath <S%G4521>day<s%>; <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G2723>accuse<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto the <S%G444>man<s%> which <S%G2192>had<s%> the <S%G3583>withered<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%>, Stand <S%G1453><s%> forth <S%G1519%G3319><s%> .

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Is it lawful <S%G1832><s%> to do good <S%G15><s%> on the sabbath days <S%G4521><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> to do evil <S%G2554><s%> ? to save <S%G4982><s%> life <S%G5590><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> to kill <S%G615><s%> ? <S%G1161>But<s%> they held their <S%G4623>peace<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when he had looked round <S%G4017>about<s%> on <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G3709>anger<s%>, being <S%G4818>grieved<s%> <S%G1909>for<s%> the <S%G4457>hardness<s%> of <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%>, he <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto the <S%G444>man<s%>, Stretch forth <S%G1614><s%> thine <S%G4675><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> . <S%G2532>And<s%> he stretched it <S%G1614>out<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5495>hand<s%> was <S%G600>restored<s%> <S%G5199>whole<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G243>other<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%> went <S%G1831>forth<s%>, and <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G4160>took<s%> <S%G4824>counsel<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> the <S%G2265>Herodians<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G3704>how<s%> they might <S%G622>destroy<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>But<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> withdrew <S%G402>himself<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> the <S%G2281>sea<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G1056>Galilee<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2449>Judaea<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2401>Idumaea<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> from <S%G4008>beyond<s%> <S%G2446>Jordan<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G5184>Tyre<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4605>Sidon<s%>, a <S%G4183>great<s%> <S%G4128>multitude<s%>, when they had <S%G191>heard<s%> what great <S%G3745>things<s%> he <S%G4160>did<s%>, <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G2036>spake<s%> to <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> a small <S%G4142>ship<s%> should wait <S%G4342>on<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of the <S%G3793>multitude<s%>, <S%G3363>lest<s%> they should <S%G2346>throng<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> he had <S%G2323>healed<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%>; insomuch <S%G5620>that<s%> they pressed <S%G1968>upon<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> for <S%G2443>to<s%> <S%G680>touch<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, as many <S%G3745>as<s%> <S%G2192>had<s%> <S%G3148>plagues<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirits<s%>, <S%G3752>when<s%> they <S%G2334>saw<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, fell down <S%G4363>before<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2896>cried<s%>, <S%G3004%G3754>saying<s%>, <S%G4771>Thou<s%> <S%G1488>art<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G4183>straitly<s%> <S%G2008>charged<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3363>that<s%> they <S%G4160>should<s%> <S%G3363>not<s%> <S%G4160>make<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G5318>known<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he goeth <S%G305>up<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> a <S%G3735>mountain<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4341>calleth<s%> unto him <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2309>would<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G565>came<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G4160>ordained<s%> <S%G1427>twelve<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> they should <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> he might <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G649>forth<s%> to <S%G2784>preach<s%>,
<S%G2532>And<s%> to <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G1849>power<s%> to <S%G2323>heal<s%> <S%G3554>sicknesses<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> to cast <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G1140>devils<s%>:
<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> he <S%G2007%G3686>surnamed<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%>;

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> the <S%G3588>son<s%> of <S%G2199>Zebedee<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%> of <S%G2385>James<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> he <S%G2007%G3686>surnamed<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G993>Boanerges<s%>, which <S%G3603>is<s%>, The <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G1027>thunder<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G406>Andrew<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5376>Philip<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G918>Bartholomew<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3156>Matthew<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2381>Thomas<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> the <S%G3588>son<s%> of <S%G256>Alphaeus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2280>Thaddaeus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> the <S%G2581>Canaanite<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2469>Iscariot<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3860>betrayed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G2064>went<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> an <S%G3624>house<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> cometh <S%G4905>together<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, so <S%G5620>that<s%> <S%G846>they<s%> <S%G1410>could<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> so much <S%G3383>as<s%> <S%G5315>eat<s%> <S%G740>bread<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> when <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3844>friends<s%> <S%G191>heard<s%> of it, they went <S%G1831>out<s%> to lay <S%G2902>hold<s%> on <S%G846>him<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> they <S%G3004%G3754>said<s%>, He is beside <S%G1839>himself<s%>.

¶ <S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G1122>scribes<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> came <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2414>Jerusalem<s%> <S%G3004%G3754>said<s%>, He <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G954%G3754>Beelzebub<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1722>by<s%> the <S%G758>prince<s%> of the <S%G1140>devils<s%> casteth he <S%G1544>out<s%> <S%G1140>devils<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G4341>called<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> unto him, and <S%G3004>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3850>parables<s%>, How <S%G4459><s%> can <S%G1410><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> cast out <S%G1544><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> ?

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> a kingdom <S%G932><s%> be divided <S%G3307><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> itself <S%G1438><s%> , that <S%G1565><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> cannot <S%G3756%G1410><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> a house <S%G3614><s%> be divided <S%G3307><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> itself <S%G1438><s%> , that <S%G1565><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> cannot <S%G3756%G1410><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> .

And <S%G2532><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> Satan <S%G4567><s%> rise up <S%G450><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> be divided <S%G3307><s%> , he cannot <S%G3756%G1410><s%> stand <S%G2476><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> an end <S%G5056><s%> .

No man <S%G3762><s%> can <S%G3756%G1410><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a strong man's <S%G2478><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> , and spoil <S%G1283><s%> his <S%G846><s%> goods <S%G4632><s%> , except <S%G3362><s%> he will <S%G1210><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> bind <S%G1210><s%> the strong man <S%G2478><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> then <S%G5119><s%> he will spoil <S%G1283><s%> his <S%G846><s%> house <S%G3614><s%> .

Verily <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> unto you <S%G5213%G3754><s%> , All <S%G3956><s%> sins <S%G265><s%> shall be forgiven <S%G863><s%> unto the sons <S%G5207><s%> of men <S%G444><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> blasphemies <S%G988><s%> wherewith <S%G3745><s%> soever <S%G302><s%> they shall blaspheme <S%G987><s%> :

But <S%G1161><s%> he <S%G3739><s%> that <S%G302><s%> shall blaspheme <S%G987><s%> against <S%G1519><s%> the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost <S%G4151><s%> hath <S%G2192><s%> never <S%G3756%G1519%G165><s%> forgiveness <S%G859><s%> , but <S%G235><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> in danger <S%G1777><s%> of eternal <S%G166><s%> damnation <S%G2920><s%> :
<S%G3754>Because<s%> they <S%G3004>said<s%>, He <S%G2192>hath<s%> an <S%G169>unclean<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%>.

¶ There <S%G2064>came<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> his <S%G3384>mother<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%>, <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%>, <S%G649>sent<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G5455>calling<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G3793>multitude<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2400>Behold<s%>, <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G3384>mother<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%> seek <S%G2212>for<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%>, Who <S%G5101><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> ?

<S%G2532>And<s%> he <S%G4017>looked<s%> round <S%G2945>about<s%> on them <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G4012>about<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, and <S%G3004>said<s%>, Behold <S%G2396><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> !

For <S%G1063><s%> whosoever <S%G3739%G302><s%> shall do <S%G4160><s%> the will <S%G2307><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> , the same <S%G3778><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brother <S%G80><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> sister <S%G79><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> mother <S%G3384><s%> .
